medical_history.chief_complaint: Involuntary flexion of the left hand and increasing difficulty moving the left foot.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 3 years prior with the left index finger bending; progressed to flexion of the fingers and curling of the left hand into a fist over 2.5 years. Approximately 1.5 years before evaluation, difficulty moving the left foot developed. Flexion of the left elbow and inversion at the ankle increased over the following year.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Occasional migraine headaches, approximately every 2 to 3 months, treated with ibuprofen. No other relevant history mentioned.
medical_history.family_history: Parents and daughter were well; no family history of neurologic illness reported.
medical_history.social_history: Patient is of African-Caribbean descent, works in education, does not smoke or drink alcohol.
